name: Azito 3D
description:
"Ajito" is the "original" defense simulation game that was released three times from 1997 to 2000 and gained great popularity. The player becomes the commander-in-chief of the secret base and builds a secret base underground.

Raise funds by developing and selling products, develop monsters, heroes, monsters and robots to protect the base, and intercept the attacking enemies.

You can enjoy the world of the secret base that you dreamed of when you were a child.
